content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 301.3 - Vehicle limitations (maximum)

State Regulations
(a) Length. Single vehicle overall including
load, 45 feet; truck or tractor with trailer or semitrailer including load............ 85 feet. (b) Width. Overall including load............ 8 feet, 6 inches. (c) Height. Overall from roadway including
load............ 13 feet, 6 inches. (d) Side overhang. Including load beyond
wheel rim............ 10 inches. (e) Wheel load. Per lineal inch of tire width............ 800 pounds. (f) Axle
load. (1)

Single vehicle-one rear axle: (i) Weight on any axle............ 18
tons. (ii)

Gross weight including
load............ 25 tons. (2)

Single vehicle-multiple rear axles: (i) Weight on any one axle............ 10
tons. (ii)

Gross weight including
load............ 25 tons. (3)

Dual vehicle (truck and trailer or
tractor and semitrailer having one rear axle): (i) Weight on any one axle of the combination............ 18 tons. (ii)

Gross
weight of both vehicles combined including their loads............ 30
tons. (4)

Dual vehicles
(truck and trailer or tractor and semitrailer) having multiple rear axles: (i) Weight on any one axle of the combination............ 10 tons. (ii)

Gross
weight of both vehicles combined including their loads............ 30
tons. Notes

Vehicles exceeding the above limitations may be permitted
across the bridge at the discretion of the manager, when advance arrangements
have been made. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
